info.name: Differential calculus strobe
info.description:
The function here is 1/2 (cos(x/6) + cos((5 x)/6)). R,G,B values are all related to 1/2 (cos(x/6) + cos((5 x)/6)). 
R value is f(x). G value is f'(x) and B value is f''(x). One can also observe that B is f(x), G is F(x) and R is F'(x).

renderpass.name: Image
